text: Lewinella xylanilytica is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped, aerobic and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Lewinella which has been isolated from coastal seawater from Marado on the Jeju Island on Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Lewinella xylanilytica at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingobacteriia Category:Bacteria described in 2015
title: Lewinella xylanilytica
